Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@Robert 
Install https://github.com/VerusCoin/Agama/releases/tag/v0.5.7-4
Disable proxy: https://support.komodoplatform.com/solution/articles/29000029569-how-to-stop-agama-from-using-a-proxy-server-to-access-electrum-servers/
Login using old seed phrase: https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000029966-logging-into-verus-agama-with-an-existing-private-key-or-seed

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
after accessing your coins, create a new wallet and transfer your coins to it
and don't input the new seed phrase in the 0.3.5 version
